research.title: He rangahau mō Scratch
research.conductors: Kei te rangahaua te Scratch e te MIT Scratch Team me ngā kairangahau o whare wānanga kē atu, pērā i a Yasmin Kafai o te University of Pennsylvania Graduate School of Education, ko Karen Brennan o te Harvard Graduate School of Education, ko Benjamin Mako Hill kei te University of Washington, ko Andrés Monroy Hernandez kei Microsoft Research, ko Mimi Ito rāua ko Crystle Martin kei te University of California, ki Irvine, ko Quinn Burke kei College of Charleston, ko Deborah Fields kei Utah State University, ko Kylie Peppler hoki kei Indiana University.
research.privacy: Mā tō tuari i ngā kaupapa me te uru ki te hapori ā-tuihono o Scratch, kei te āwhina koe i a mātou ki te kimi mārama, ka pēhea te tangata e whakamahi, e ako hoki mā Scratch. Ina tuaritia ngā kaupapa, ngā tukunga kōrero, rauemi kē rānei i te paetukutuku Scratch, tērā pea ka rangahaua aua mahi, ka tukua hoki ki ngā whakaaturanga, ki ngā pepa me ngā rīpoata. Kāore rawa e tuaritia ngā mōhiohio whaiaro o te tangata. (Mēnā he pātai āu, whakapā mai ki konei: {contactLink}.)
research.intro: Kei raro nei ētahi o ngā pepa rangahau, ngā whakaaturanga hoki, ngā tuhinga roa hoki mō Scratch me te hapori ā-tuihono o Scratch, ka tāpiritia hoki te rārangi o ngā tukunga pūtea nā te National Science Foundation ka whakawhiwhia hei tautoko i te Scratch.
research.papers: He Pepa Rangahau me ngā Whakaaturanga
research.grants: Ngā Tukunga Pūtea a te National Science Foundation
